replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content:
# Server Sided! The time in minutes after a player can use 'Free Revive' if it is 'true'. The time can go from 1 min to 100000 mins (close to a week). (default: 20)
    I:"Death System - Revive Timer"=5   （这里修改数字为0）
